item.title: Tidyverse
item.description: #install.packages("gapminder") #install.packages("dplyr") library(gapminder) library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) Tidyverse # {dplyr} a. Verbs: filter(like subset), arrange(like order), b. mutate, select(choose column), transmute(select and calculate new column), rename(newname=oldname) c. summarize(output 1 row tibble), group_by(make summarize output each row), count(# of specific var) d. glimpse(str() for big tibbles) {ggplot2} a. aesthetic up to 4 dimensions(x,y,color,size) b. layers: geom_point()-x,y, geom_line()-x,y, geom_col()-x,y, geom_histogram(binwidth=,bins=)-x geom_boxplot()-x,y. x is category(# of boxes), y is numerical obs. C. scale_x_log10(), facet_wrap(~year), expand_limits(y=0) Other Packages: forcats, tibble, readr, stringr, tidyr, purrr gapminder ## # A tibble: 1,704 Ã— 6 ## country continent year lifeExp pop gdpPercap ## <fct> <fct> <int> <dbl> <int> <dbl> ## 1 Afghanistan Asia 1952 28.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown # This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

This page is hidden in menu # Quondam non pater est dignior ille Eurotas # Latent te facies # Lorem markdownum arma ignoscas vocavit quoque ille texit mandata mentis ultimus, frementes, qui in vel.
